title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1628 - Budget And Fiscal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1628 - Budget And Fiscal

State Regulations

Subpart 1628-1 - Budget Preparation (§ 1628-1.1)

Subpart 1628-2 - Budget Program (§ 1628-2.1)

Subpart 1628-3 - Special Approvals, Revisions And Overruns (§ 1628-3.1 to 1628-3.2)

Subpart 1628-4 - Purchases And Contracts (§ 1628-4.1 to 1628-4.6)

Subpart 1628-5 - Inventory Control (§ 1628-5.1)

Subpart 1628-6 - Disposal Of Excess Equipment (§ 1628-6.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1628

Statutory authority: Public Housing Law, §§14, 19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
